msContents.summary:
This is a multiple text manuscript containing three texts, namely an unknown vyākaraṇa commentary containing a discussion of the Śivasūtras or akṣarasamāmnāya, the Nikṣeparakṣā of Vedāntācārya, and the Gṛhārcāpratiṣṭhāvidhi. Badly broken condition.
After the Gṛhārcāpratiṣṭhāvidhi two more unknown texts are seen. x1 has only one and half lines and rest is left blank. x1-1 viśvāmitro mahātejā ābhyāgatamupacakrame iharārāmamahābāhurviṣṇudevaṃvaraṃ prabhuṃ adṛśyassarvabhutānāṃ sarvā x1-2 māsarvalokayut mohanā(gap of two syllables due to damaged folio.) lokasya
x2 has two folios. x2 1v-1 vinā kvacit kiñcit vidhireṣaḥ pravartakaḥ . sa śeṣasarvaṃ jātāni vedavidyaḥ paraḥ pumān . mahātyani x2 2r-8 tra kāryamajānatā . śrīyatāncābhimayāsyāmi yasatra pratiti bhāti mājantu .. śūbhāśubhaṃ karmabhuk te svenaiva karmaṇāha gatān sarvabhutānāṃ sarvavedaśubhāśubaṃ

msItem.title: Unkown vyākaraṇa commentary
msItem.incipit:

maheśvaraprasādalabdhānītiphalitaṃ evañ caivam ānupūrvikā śrutir evaiṣā ta
msItem.explicit: sarvavedapāra iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākaraṇam upaka veda iche vyetam apa

msItem.title: Nikṣeparakṣā
msItem.author: Vedāntācārya
msItem.rubric: nir-1v 1 [śrīmate mahādeśikāya namaḥ] (broken folio so loss of a few syllables)
msItem.incipit: nir-1v 1 gatāgata (loss of approximately 2 syllables) harassarvāvagā (gap of 1 syllable) svayaṃ ? saṃśeṣa sadhanurvardhitastadā ko mahān
msItem.explicit:
nir-35v 6 rahasyaṃ yanmayā gopaniyyaṃ svalinamapi yadiṣṭam būyasā vā tadetad nijamahimaviśeṣapremamātreṇa nāthākṣamata iti vicintya kṣantumarhanti santaḥ .. gurūcaraṇasapa
nir-35v 7 ryyāsvādavaideśikānāṃ pravītamavadhūya prāktanai tārrya nai[va] [1 illegible syllable] pṛṇana paramārkaṃ veṃkaṭeśaḥ prajānāṃ nigamagirini [1 illegible syllable] [tha?]tyā savidyāniyataṃ ..
msItem.finalRubric:
nir-35v 7 iti kavitā
nir-35v 8 rkkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṃkaṭanāthasya mamanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛti nikṣeparakṣā samāptā .. hariḥ oṃ śrīmate nigamāntagurave namaḥ ..

msItem.title: Gṛhārcāpratiṣṭhāvidhi
msItem.incipit:
grv-1v 1 gṛhe pratiṣṭhāṃ vakṣyāmi (gap of a syllable due to broken folio.) māsāṃ devasāṃprataṃ navabhāgagraha kṛtvā yajyāt sūtreṇa lā?yet tat grahoktadigbhāge samyeśā
grv-1v 2 navadanva?
msItem.finalRubric:
grv-7v 5 iti śrīpāñcarātre homaniṣadivarāhasaṃhitāyāṃ gṛhārcā
grv-7v 6 pratiṣṭhānāmapañadaśodhyāyaḥ .. .. hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu śrīgurūbhyo namaḥ śrīmadvedāntagurave namaḥ ..

extent.measure: 2 guard folio 1 blank folio and 45 written folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin. Separate numeration for both the texts.
supportDesc.condition: Good state in spite of worm holes and injured folio.

handNote.desc: The writing on the guard folio is hasty, badly worn and smeared in places.

additions.desc: On grv-1v hariḥ oṃ is wriiten in the Left margin
Gṛhārcāpratiṣṭhāvidhi is written in the left margin on grv-1v .
hariḥ oṃ śubham astu is written in left margin on nir-1v of Nikṣeparakṣā.
